name: UNKYS.exe
description:
exec.UNKYS

Based on the classic TUNKY and BUNKY games created by Dave Microwaves Games, UNKYS.exe brings these monsters to life... Literally. They have somehow found their way into the real world and your goal is to either escape them or banish them once and for all.

load.FEATURES

  • 3 completely different gameplay locations
  • 3 unlockable difficulty options for each map
  • A slew of random events to keep each playthrough unique
  • Hidden collectibles
  • Unlockable trophies
  • User-friendly settings for accessibility
  • A secret alternate ending. Will you be able to find it?
  • At least an hour of gameplay (estimated playtime varies from person to person)

load.CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • SHIFT to run
  • C or CTRLto crouch
  • F to toggle flashlight
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to interact
  • RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to lock & unlock doors
  • Q or E to peek around corners
  • SPACEBAR to look behind you
  • M to open your map

load.CREDITS

  • JayskiBean - Development, Textures, Sounds, Models, Etc.
  • Padre Snowmizzle & Dave Microwaves Games - QA Testing

load.INSTRUCTIONS

  1. Download .zip File.
  2. Extract all files from the zip folder (make sure they all go into the same folder)
  3. Launch the game from inside of the folder
  4. Enjoy!
